instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in this book. Please take as much time with each ad as you care to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, you'll need them.

questions.q2: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?
questions.q3a: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3a.
questions.q3b: IF ONLY ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.3b.
questions.q4: IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.4.
questions.q10: IF TRUE MENTIONED IN Q.2, 3 OR 3b CONTINUE. IF TRUE NOT MENTIONED IN Q.2, 3a OR 3b. SKIP TO Q.10.
